Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Moderation

Syntax
[Group("moderation", "Do all your moderation stuffs here!")]
public class SlashPunishCommands : MewdekoSlashSubmodule<UserPunishService>, IInteractionModuleBase

Ban(IGuildUser, string, string)

Bans a user in the server with an optional time and reason

Declaration
[SlashCommand("ban", "Bans a user by their ID", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.BanMembers)]
[BotPerm(GuildPermission.BanMembers)]
public Task Ban(IGuildUser user, string reason = null, string time = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuildUser user

The user to ban
string reason

The reason for the ban
string time

The duration of the ban
